Subject: Megatron
References: <35.191eacb6.28a58cba@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron still stood in front of the Obylisk, waiting for some sort of
sign of life, when his vision failed him. What is this? he thought, is
my internal circuitry malfunctioning? Then he was filled with a message,
Brother? Don't Trust? 

"I trust no one." Megatron shouted outloud, through gritted teeth, as
his vision returned, and he realised that there must be something wrong
with his optics, as nothing eventful had happened.
